member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.CriteriaBuilderSettings.RootJunctionPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the string displayed before the root junction item.
member.remarks: This string can explain the meaning of each row in the recordset. For example "Select books where" or "Find products where"

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.CriteriaBuilderSettings.JunctionPostfix
member.summary: Gets or sets the string displayed after each junction item.
member.remarks: Can be used to approximate the form of conditions to the spoken language. Might be set to "of the following apply" or "of the following succeed".

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.CriteriaBuilderSettings.ShowPrefixes
member.summary: Gets or sets the sign of displaying the "or" or "and" prefix for all conditions in a junction group except the first one.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.CriteriaBuilderSettings.LoadStyleFrom
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to custom css file

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.GridSettings.NullOrderingInOrderBy
member.summary: Allows to display "NULLS FIRST"/"NULLS LAST" options in the Sort Type column.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.GridSettings.OrColumnCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of "Or" columns displayed in the grid.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.GridSettings.UseCustomExpressionBuilder
member.summary: Allows to use custom expression builder for Expression and/or condition columns of the control.

remarks.para: When this option is enabled for a column, the ellipsis button appears at this column while editing it's content. By clicking this button, the component fires the QueryBuilder.CustomExpressionBuilder event. The handler for this event should provide the way to edit this column's content and return the result.
Note: Active Query Builder Professional .NET Subscription includes the Expression Editor facility with code completion and syntax highlight to be used for the same purpose.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.GridSettings.QuickFilterInExpressionMatchFromBeginning
member.summary: Determines the way of filtration in the Expression column dropdown list.
member.value: True instructs to search from beginning of the object name; false to search by substring. Default value is false.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.ObjectTreeViewSettings.ShowDescriptionInTooltip
member.summary: Instructs to show descriptions of database objects in the tree.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.ObjectTreeViewSettings.ShowFields
member.summary: Determines visibility of database object fields within the Database Schema Tree.
member.value: true if fields are shown, false if not.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.ObjectTreeViewSettings.SortingType
member.summary: Determines the way database objects are sorted in the list.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.ObjectTreeViewSettings.SortOrder
member.summary: Determines order database objects are sorted in the list.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.QueryBuilderSettings.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the component's UI language by it's code.
member.remarks: The list of available languages can be taken from the Localizer.Languages field.

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.QueryBuilderSettings.LoadStyleFrom
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to custom css file

member.name: P:ActiveQueryBuilder.Web.Server.Settings.SubQueryNavigationBarSettings.UnionNavBarVisible
member.summary: Determines visibility of the Union Sub-query Navigation Bar (at the right).
